ComicInfo.Summary: Sylvester spends all day cleaning then goes home to perform the same chores.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:13:10. [CVDB166063] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:54:08. [Issue ID 250720]
